pages.title: Golem Soul
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 4 $(li)Treasure = False $(li)Tradeable = True $(li)Rarity = Common $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Gain knockback resistance by sacrificing speed

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Falling more than 4 blocks, slows all surrounding entities
